subMembers.name: Configuration
subMembers.description: An object that specifies configuration properties for the Sparkline UI component.

subMembers.name: argumentField
subMembers.description: Specifies the data source field that provides arguments for a sparkline.

subMembers.name: barNegativeColor
subMembers.description: Sets a color for the bars indicating negative values. Available for a sparkline of the *bar* type only.

subMembers.name: barPositiveColor
subMembers.description: Sets a color for the bars indicating positive values. Available for a sparkline of the *bar* type only.

subMembers.name: dataSource
subMembers.type: Store | DataSource | DataSource_Options | String | Array<any> | null
subMembers.description: Binds the UI component to data.

subMembers.name: firstLastColor
subMembers.description: Sets a color for the boundary of both the first and last points on a sparkline.

subMembers.name: ignoreEmptyPoints
subMembers.description: Specifies whether the sparkline should ignore null data points.

subMembers.name: lineColor
subMembers.description: Sets a color for a line on a sparkline. Available for the sparklines of the line- and area-like types.

subMembers.name: lineWidth
subMembers.description: Specifies a width for a line on a sparkline. Available for the sparklines of the line- and area-like types.

subMembers.name: lossColor
subMembers.description: Sets a color for the bars indicating the values that are less than the [winloss threshold]. Available for a sparkline of the *winloss* type only.

subMembers.name: maxColor
subMembers.description: Sets a color for the boundary of the maximum point on a sparkline.

subMembers.name: maxValue
subMembers.description: Specifies the maximum value of the sparkline's value axis.

subMembers.name: minColor
subMembers.description: Sets a color for the boundary of the minimum point on a sparkline.

subMembers.name: minValue
subMembers.description: Specifies the minimum value of the sparkline value axis.

subMembers.name: pointColor
subMembers.description: Sets a color for points on a sparkline. Available for the sparklines of the line- and area-like types.

subMembers.name: pointSize
subMembers.description: Specifies the diameter of sparkline points in pixels. Available for the sparklines of line- and area-like types.

subMembers.name: pointSymbol
subMembers.description: Specifies a symbol to use as a point marker on a sparkline. Available for the sparklines of the line- and area-like types.

subMembers.name: showFirstLast
subMembers.description: Specifies whether or not to indicate both the first and last values on a sparkline.

subMembers.name: showMinMax
subMembers.description: Specifies whether or not to indicate both the minimum and maximum values on a sparkline.

subMembers.name: type
subMembers.description: Determines the type of a sparkline.

subMembers.name: valueField
subMembers.description: Specifies the data source field that provides values for a sparkline.

subMembers.name: winColor
subMembers.description: Sets a color for the bars indicating the values greater than a [winloss threshold]. Available for a sparkline of the *winloss* type only.

subMembers.name: winlossThreshold
subMembers.description: Specifies a value that serves as a threshold for the sparkline of the winloss type.

properties.name: dxSparkline
properties.description: The Sparkline UI component is a compact chart that contains only one series. Owing to their size, sparklines occupy very little space and can be easily collected in a table or embedded straight in text.

Events.name: onDisposing
Events.description: A function that is executed before the UI component is [disposed of].md '{basewidgetpath}/Methods/#dispose').

Events.name: onDrawn
Events.description: A function that is executed when the UI component's rendering has finished.

Events.name: onExported
Events.description: A function that is executed after the UI component is exported.

Events.name: onExporting
Events.description: A function that is executed before the UI component is exported.

Events.name: onFileSaving
Events.description: A function that is executed before a file with exported UI component is saved to the user's local storage.

Events.name: onIncidentOccurred
Events.description: A function that is executed when an error or warning occurs.

Events.name: onInitialized
Events.description: A function used in JavaScript frameworks to save the UI component instance.

Events.name: onOptionChanged
Events.description: A function that is executed after a UI component property is changed.

Events.name: onTooltipHidden
Events.description: A function that is executed when a tooltip becomes hidden.

Events.name: onTooltipShown
Events.description: A function that is executed when a tooltip appears.

subMembers.name: BaseSparklineTooltip
subMembers.description: Configures the tooltip.

subMembers.name: contentTemplate
subMembers.description: Specifies a custom template for tooltips.

subMembers.name: customizeTooltip
subMembers.description: Allows you to change tooltip appearance.

subMembers.name: enabled
subMembers.description: Specifies whether a tooltip is enabled.

subMembers.name: interactive
subMembers.description: <!-- %shortDescription% -->

Types.name: DisposingEvent
Types.description: The type of the [disposing] event handler's argument.

Types.name: DrawnEvent
Types.description: The type of the [drawn] event handler's argument.

Types.name: ExportedEvent
Types.description: The type of the [exported] event handler's argument.

Types.name: ExportingEvent
Types.description: The type of the [exporting] event handler's argument.

Types.name: FileSavingEvent
Types.description: The type of the [fileSaving] event handler's argument.

Types.name: IncidentOccurredEvent
Types.description: The type of the [incidentOccurred] event handler's argument.

Types.name: InitializedEvent
Types.description: The type of the [initialized] event handler's argument.

Types.name: OptionChangedEvent
Types.description: The type of the [optionChanged] event handler's argument.

Types.name: TooltipHiddenEvent
Types.description: The type of the [tooltipHidden] event handler's argument.

Types.name: TooltipShownEvent
Types.description: The type of the [tooltipShown] event handler's argument.
